post.body: I'm up!Finally went 2 sleep, 2 much caffeine last nite!Wanted 2 stay awake 2 ring in the NY! Hubby didn't make it! Relaxing 2day~no agenda.
Think I'll go read-see if I can fall asleep.In college I'd read my history book 2 help me fall asleep-didn't do 2 well in that class! Later!
Went 2 neighbor's annual NYE party.Had 2 DPs 2 stay awake.I'll b up 4 awhile!Had gr8 times in 2008, looking 4ward 2 see what 2009 brings!
Seems like I've bn gone 4 awhile-lots of changes taking place 4 the start of 2009. Started p/t job @ Tues. Morning, working on new routine!
Been taking Alamo 2 Fort Woof (dog park) great place-nice dogs/people. Still exercising early (cycling class/pilates, etc.) & going to lake!
Wishing all a Most Blessed 2009!!!
DD & I went 2 Angelika 2 see "Doubt", saw the play, interesting comparison. Beautiful day 2day, tomorrow suppose 2b cold! Tweet ya later!
DD coming over 4 dinner, watch Kath & Kim/The Office, wash clothes, check email (she doesn't have internet @ her place yet). Luv visitng!
Cold (28 degrees), dark, heading 2 5:45a exercise class, but the Christmas lights are on! Luv it! Shopping on eBay~got some gr8 deals!Later!
Heading 2 Advent service after I get dog hair off me~note 2 self: don't wear black (Alamo is white)! ~ sweet dog, gotta luv him! See ya!
Christmas tree~decorated!2day DD 23 Birthday~nice having her home this yr. DS-a pastor/check out the Advent Devotion he wrote. Luv my kids!
My son wrote a beautiful Advent Devotion: http://tinyurl.com/6my5xd
Bought beautiful Christmas tree Sat/it's in water/haven't decorated yet~hopefully tomorrow! Definitely b4 Christmas! Where does the time go?
This is truly a busy time, parties, shopping, and just keeping up with everything else! Whew! Where does the time go? Calling it a nite!
Brrrr cold front coming in! And it was so nice 2day. Alamo is getting on the couch when we're gone, dog hair-dead giveaway. Hmmm what 2 do.
Alamo takes a while 2settle down when I come back fr anywhere!BSF/then lunched w/DD @ Taste of Europe/Russian Island~like a museum in there!
What a day! Where did it go? See if I can find it tomorrow! Nite all!
Well, I think I'm through 4 2day. Going outside 2 check out Jupiter and Venus! Alamo is doing great, getting used to his new family. Later!
Bought 1st Christmas present on eBay/used my coupon! Now I'm off 2 ship my Amazon sale! Went 2 5:45a cycling class~dog 2 lake, COLD outside!
Cold/windy 2day.Took Alamo 2 lake, ran him ragged/sleeping like a baby.Sold another book on Amazon!Luv coming home to a sale!Tweet ya later!
